name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in full-stack development, adept at leveraging **Python 3**, **FastAPI**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Google Cloud Platform** to deliver high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in real-time data processing and crafting robust APIs and web services that enhance system integration and functionality.

Demonstrated ability to implement scalable solutions using **RabbitMQ**, **Apache Kafka**, and **Google Pub/Sub** for efficient messaging and data streaming. Skilled in employing modern JavaScript/TypeScript technologies such as **React** and **Node.js**, as well as frameworks like **Django** to build seamless user experiences.

Strong problem-solving skills and a collaborative team player, I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. My technical journey is complemented by hands-on experience with monitoring tools and CI/CD processes, ensuring that applications meet compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
